'''The Minstrel''' is the fifth track of [[Blind Guardian]]'s Tolkien themed album, [[Nightfall in Middle-Earth]].

==Lyrics==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">So I stand still
In front of the crowd
Excited faces
Whar will be next?
I still don't have a clue
</poem>
